```{r echo=TRUE, warning=TRUE}
library(deisotoper)
library(DiagrammeR)

input <- "http://fgcz-ms.uzh.ch/~cpanse/R257544/TP_HeLa_200ng.RData"

objN <- load(con <- url(input));
obj <- get(objN);

ms <- jCreateMS(obj[44]);

ims <- jCreateIMS(ms)

dot <- deisotoper::jGetDot(massspectrum = ms, isotopicmassspectrum = ims, index = 0);

grViz(dot, width = 700)
  
```
